snippet.title: Roar of Revenge  -  Trailer
snippet.description:
A game that puts together Rastan's action with adventure elements inspired by Faxanadu. An old school tribute for every lover of 8-bit classics! 
Add on your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1680500/Roar_of_Revenge/


Special Credits:

Dragon, ThreeForms and 
some enemies  Graphics:
Stephen Challener (Redshrike), 
hosted by OpenGameArt.org
